```{r, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}

base_dir <- getwd()
src_dir <- file.path(base_dir, "src")

source(file.path(src_dir, "sim_study_functions.r"))
```

```{r}
# Create experiment. 
config <- init_experiment(experiment_id="test", experiment_type="llik_emulator_seq_design", 
                          parent_dir=experiment_parent_dir, global_seed=5, set_seed=TRUE)
print(paste0("Experiment ID: ", config$base_settings$experiment_id))

# Test loading the experiment. 
config <- load_experiment(experiment_id="test", parent_dir=experiment_parent_dir, set_seed=TRUE)
print(paste0("Experiment ID: ", config$base_settings$experiment_id))
```
